name: Temple of Magic
description:
Ok I took a tiny break and fixed up this little piece of my game dev history, added some music and added an Intro, 2 Endings, and a score screen. Wasn't my first game but it was probably my most complex back when actively developed in 2007, full of secret areas and unique skills you wont find in another platformer. This small game (7mb) is short and sweet probably takes 10 minutes per play through, but tons of replay-ability for speed runs and completionists. Can you find all 7 Magic Chalices? Give it a shot!

Arrow keys = Move

UP + Left = Jump Left

UP + Right = Jump Right

Down = Crouch & Shield(if unlocked) & Down Ladder

Up = Up Ladder

Shift = Hold + Move to run

1 = Fire Cannonballs

2 = Spawn Anvil

4 = Transform ????

5 = Transform ????

6 = Revert to Normal

Collect Blue Crystals to use magic. All moves except for Cannonball is unavailable until Clara learns them from Magic Tablets hidden throughout Dungeon. Find and collect Golden Chalices to restore health and greatly effect your final score. Obtain all 7 and you get best ending.
